caption:
Looking to nail your swag strategy? It starts with knowing WHO you're giving it to! 🎯

3 ways to really understand your audience:
• Create detailed personas (not just demographics!)
• Track which merch people actually USE (not just take)
• Ask directly what they want (novel concept, right?)

The best promotional products aren't just branded—they're specifically designed for YOUR people.

What's the most useful branded item you've ever received?

#BrandedMerch #TargetAudience #PromotionalStrategy
